item.title: Unit 02 SDMX XML data transmission formats
item.description: SDMX-ML 2.1 Generic data message The Generic message’s key characteristic is that its XML schema is fixed. By contrast, the structure-specific XML schema is variable and defined the dataset’s DSD. While more verbose, the fixed schema can make it easier to create and process Generic messages because the XML structure is always the same. The SDMX-ML 2.1 Generic data message aligns with the SDMX 2.1 information model. Example: The example below is an excerpt from a Generic data message.
